Definition.Description: Reduced TA turnaround time by 2-16hrs per chromatography cycle.  Monitor to prevent column re-pack and re-slurry ( $100k+ /occurrence) Calculate near real-time production-scale column HETP and Asymmetry during column transition periods to monitor for column integrity and consistent operations using the moment analysis technique. Definition.Document:
Transition Analysis

Calculate near real-time production-scale column HETP and Asymmetry during column transition periods to monitor for column integrity and consistent operations using the moment analysis technique.

Contextualize

Begin with the conductivity and flow rate signals. Clean and smooth signal as needed. 

  • Cleaned Signals

Identify transition periods with conductivity, flow, or DCS phase type signal(s).

  • Transition Periods 

Calculate

HETP

Quantify the column efficiency by calculating the HETP using a moment analysis.

  • HETP

Asymmetry 

Quantify the column integrity and pack quality by calculating peak asymmetry using volume changes.

  • Asymmetry

Monitor

Set thresholds and monitor the HETP and Asymmetry in real time.

  • Deviations
